name: Intelligence: Anime girls
description: Puzzle game in which you want to build an image (with beautiful anime girls) so that the picture was like the original image. Move the puzzle tiles wisely to collect the correct order of the pieces of images. The essence of the game as in the old game "Tag" (15).
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: Athlon 2 X3 450 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce EN9600 GT Storage: 94 MB available space
